Parameters: @B_android#print#PrinterInfo_E@
PrinterInfo: Other info from which to start building. This value must never be null.

Returns: This builder. This value will never be null.
Parameters: int
int: The resource ID of the icon.
setIconResourceId(int).Description: Set a drawable resource as icon for this printer. If no icon is set the printer's service's icon is used for the printer.

Returns: This builder. This value will never be null.
Parameters: @B_java#lang#String_E@
String: The description. This value must never be null.

Returns: This builder. This value will never be null.
Parameters: @B_android#print#PrinterCapabilitiesInfo_E@
PrinterCapabilitiesInfo: The capabilities. This value must never be null.

Returns: This builder. This value will never be null.
Parameters: boolean
boolean: If the printer has a custom icon or not.
setHasCustomPrinterIcon(boolean).Description: Declares that the print service can load a custom per printer's icon. If both @B_android#print#PrinterInfo#Builder#setIconResourceId_E@ and a custom icon are set the resource icon is shown while the custom icon loads but then the custom icon is used. If @B_android#print#PrinterInfo#Builder#setIconResourceId_E@ is not set the printer's service's icon is shown while loading. The icon is requested asynchronously and only when needed via @B_android#printservice#PrinterDiscoverySession#onRequestCustomPrinterIcon_E@.

Parameters: @B_android#print#PrinterId_E@
PrinterId: The printer id. Cannot be null. This value must never be null.
@B_java#lang#String_E@
String: The printer name. Cannot be empty. This value must never be null.
int

int: The printer status. Must be a valid status. Value is @B_android#print#PrinterInfo#STATUS_IDLE_E@, @B_android#print#PrinterInfo#STATUS_BUSY_E@, or @B_android#print#PrinterInfo#STATUS_UNAVAILABLE_E@
Throws: If the printer id is null, or the printer name is empty or the status is not a valid one.
